content: Introducing our new Butter Chicken Bowl! Made with tender chicken marinated in a rich buttery sauce, served over a bed of fluffy rice. Perfectly spiced with a blend of Indian spices, this dish is sure to satisfy your cravings for bold and savory flavors. Don't miss out, try our Butter Chicken Bowl today and enjoy 10% off your order with the code BUTTERBOWL10 at checkout. Limited time offer, so hurry in!
